articles.description: Immunw Boosting Foods for Covid 19: Here are the foods that can help to fight against covid 19 like green tea, muscadine grapes, dark chocolate which helps to boost immunity, controls blood pressure and more on Times Food
articles.content:
Apart from this, these 3 foods are also loaded with numerous other benefits like -
